div.pre: 2314 Tarragona prov., 1870 (1062) Burial: end 4th cent. B.C. (Guadan) Contents: 39 AR Emporiae: 19 fr. Unc. Spanish: 3 fr. Massalia: 16 ob. Selinus: 1 lit. Disposition: Barcelona 2 Delgado, MAE III, pp. 179, 194 â€ Zobel y Zangroniz, MNE 1877-9, pp. 119-21 Vives, MH I, p. 24, nos. 7, 9 Amoros, MEAD, pp. 40-50 de Guadan, Numisma 16 (1955), p. 15; MPER, pp. 96-8
